org.apache.cassandra.tracing

Class Tracing

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.cassandra.tracing.Tracing

  • public class Tracing
extends java.lang.Object
    A trace session context. Able to track and store trace sessions. A session is usually a user initiated query, and may have multiple local and remote events before it is completed. All events and sessions are stored at keyspace.
